```{r}
#This gives a simple monte carlo integration#

n<-10000; u<-rgamma(n,3.7,1);

den<-1:(n)

#The function to be integrated

mci.ex <- function(x) x*log(x)

par(mfrow=c(1,3))
plot(function(x) mci.ex(x),xlim=c(0,2),ylim=c(-.7,.7),xlab="Function",ylab="")

#The monte carlo sum
hint<-mci.ex(u)

hplot<-cumsum(hint)/den

stdh<-sqrt( cumsum(hint^2)/den - (hplot)^2)

par(new=F)

hist(hint,xlab="Generated Values of Function",
     freq=F,col="green",breaks=30,ylab="",main="")

par(new=F)

plot(hplot,type="l",col="blue",xlab="Mean and Standard Errors",
     ylab="",xlim=c(1,n),ylim=c(1,7))

par(new=T)

plot(hplot+stdh/sqrt(den),type="l",col="green",xlab="",
     ylab="",lty=2)

par(new=T)

plot(hplot-stdh/sqrt(den),type="l",col="red",
     xlab="",ylab="",lty=2)

```
